title: How to Change Your Limiting Thoughts & Beliefs Around Success, Self-Love & Happiness w/Lilly Singh EP 1250
description:
Lilly Singh is a Canadian comedian, actress, former talk show host, and YouTuber. Singh has found worldwide fame through her comedic and inspirational content, amassing nearly 40 million followers across her social media channels alongside projects with NBC, Netflix and other major Hollywood studios via her production company Unicorn Island Productions. She's written a new book, BE A TRIANGLE: How I Went from Being Lost to Getting MY Life into Shape


 

In this episode we discuss:

  • The key to living a fulfilling life
  • The biggest mistake people make with manifesting
  • How to approach failure
  • How to value yourself beyond your work


 

For more, go to lewishowes.com/1250

Purchase Lilly's new book here: Be A Triangle: How I Went from Being Lost to Getting My Life into Shape


 

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Transforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/826-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
